{"className":"org.joget.apps.form.model.Form","properties":{"noPermissionMessage":"","loadBinder":{"className":"org.joget.tutorial.JdbcLoadBinder","properties":{"autoHandleWorkflowVariable":"true","jdbcDatasource":"default","sql":"select requestNo,licenseNo,
licenseName, wellNo
,licenseStartDate,licenseExpireDate
,requestType,licenseeFullname,licenseeID
, li.c_nameTitleID as personNameTitleIDReq
, li.c_firstname as personFirstnameReq
, li.c_lastname as personLastnameReq
, DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(), li.c_birthDate)), "%Y")+0 AS personAgeReq
, li.c_licenseeStatus as requesterStatus
, li.c_licenseeUserID as idCard
, li.c_phoneNumber as phoneNumber
, li.c_fax as faxNumber
, li.c_email as email
, re.c_companyTitleID as companyTitleID
, li.c_companyName as companyNameReq
, re.c_companyNameTitleID1 as companyNameTitleID1
, re.c_companyNameTitleID2 as companyNameTitleID2
, re.c_companyNameTitleID3 as companyNameTitleID3
, re.c_companyFirstname1 as companyFirstname1
, re.c_companyFirstname2 as companyFirstname2
, re.c_companyFirstname3 as companyFirstname3
, re.c_companyLastname1 as companyLastname1
, re.c_companyLastname2 as companyLastname2
, re.c_companyLastname3 as companyLastname3
, re.c_companyAge1 as companyAge1
, re.c_companyAge2 as companyAge2
, re.c_companyAge3 as companyAge3
, re.c_companyNationality1 as companyNationality1
, re.c_companyNationality2 as companyNationality2
, re.c_companyNationality3 as companyNationality3
, Concat(
	"เลขที่ ",IFNULL(li.c_addressNo, "-")
    ," หมู่ที่ ",IFNULL(li.c_moo,"-")
    ," ตรอก/ซอย ",IFNULL(li.c_soi,"-")
    ," ถนน ",IFNULL(li.c_street,"-")
    ," ตําบล/แขวง ",IFNULL(li.c_tambon,"-")
    ," อําเภอ/เขต ",IFNULL(li.c_amphoe,"-")
    ," จังหวัด ",IFNULL(li.c_province,"-")
    ," รหัสไปรษณีย์ ",IFNULL(li.c_postalcode,"-")
) as requestPlace
from (SELECT id 
,c_requestNo  as requestNo
,c_drillLicenseNo AS licenseNo 
,c_drillLicenseName AS licenseName
,c_wellNo AS wellNo
,c_licenseStartDate AS licenseStartDate
,c_licenseExpireDate AS licenseExpireDate
,'การขอโอนใบอนุญาตเจาะน้ำบาดาล' AS requestType
, c_drillLicenseName AS licenseeFullname 
, c_licenseeID as licenseeID
FROM app_fd_dgr_drill_license 
WHERE c_licenseStartDate <= NOW() AND c_licenseExpireDate >= NOW()
AND c_drillLicenseNo <> ""
AND c_drillLicenseName <> ""
AND c_wellNo <> ""
UNION
SELECT id 
,c_requestNo as requestNo
,c_usageLicenseNo AS licenseNo 
,c_usageLicenseName AS licenseName
,c_wellNo AS wellNo
,c_licenseStartDate AS licenseStartDate
,c_licenseExpireDate AS licenseExpireDate
,'การขอโอนใบอนุญาตใช้น้ำบาดาล' AS requestType
, c_usageLicenseName AS licenseeFullname 
, c_licenseeID as licenseeID
FROM app_fd_dgr_usage_license 
WHERE c_licenseStartDate <= NOW() AND c_licenseExpireDate >= NOW()
AND c_usageLicenseNo <> ""
AND c_usageLicenseName <> ""
AND c_wellNo <> "")  a
left join app_fd_dgr_licensee li on li.id = a.licenseeID
left join app_fd_dgr_regis_license re on a.requestNo = re.c_requestNo
where a.id = '#requestParam.liId#'","autoHandleFiles":""}},"name":"นบ./15 คำขอโอนใบอนุญาต","description":"Application form for a license to penetrate groundwater or use
